param.name: pasteFromWordCleanupFile
param.label: PasteFromWord CleanupFile
param.description: The file that provides the MS Word cleanup function for pasting operations. Note: This is a global configuration shared by all editor instances present in the page.

param.name: pasteFromWordNumberedHeadingToList
param.label: Convert Number Headings to List
param.description: Determines whether to transform MS Word outline numbered headings into lists.

param.name: pasteFromWordPromptCleanup
param.label: Always Prompt When Pasting From MS Word
param.description: Determines whether to prompt the user about the clean up of content being pasted from MS Word.

param.name: pasteFromWordRemoveStyles
param.label: Ignore Styles
param.description: Determines whether to remove element styles that can't be managed with the editor. Note that this doesn't handle the font specific styles, which depends on the Ignore Font Styles setting instead.
